means: （拉拉队鼓动运动员的）呼喊声

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"喊，叫"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: cry, shout, exclaim, roar, scream, shriek, yell, call
means: cry ： 一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。
shout ： 指有意识地高声喊叫，常用于提出警告、发命令或唤起注意等。
exclaim ： 多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。
roar ： 指发出大而深沉的声音、吼叫或咆哮。
scream ： 指因恐具、快乐或痛苦而发出的尖叫声。
shriek ： 指因惊恐、痛苦等或其它感情而发出比scream更为尖锐、刺耳的叫声。
yell ： 多指求援、鼓励时的呼叫。也可指因外界因素刺激而发出尖厉声音。
call ： 指大声说话或喊叫，以引起某人的注意。

word_mean: 拉拉队有节奏的叫喊声

sentence.Network_en: Something brushed past Bob's face and he let out a yell.
sentence.Network_cn: 有什么东西从鲍勃的脸上扫过，他大叫了一声。

sentence.Network_en: "Please don't yell at me." She began to sniffle.
sentence.Network_cn: “请不要对我大喊大叫。”她啜泣起来。

sentence.Network_en: This gave them a chance to yell.
sentence.Network_cn: 这给了他们大声喊叫的机会.

yell out your english . yell out your potential., 喊出你的英文 . 喊出你的潜能.
billy idol的详细资料_百度知道 ... “反叛的呼声”（ Rebel Yell） 和 “悬浮的眼睛”（  Eyes Without a Face）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English g(i)ellan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch gillen and German gellen

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名称：yell 演唱组合：生物股长 专辑名称：YELL ( じょいふる) 发行时间：2009-09-23 歌曲歌词 歌词版本：日文/罗马音/中文 作曲： 水野良树 「“わたしは”今 どこに 在るの」と 「watashiwa ima dokoni aruno」to “‘我’ 如今 身在何处？” 踏みしめた足迹を何度も见つめ返す fumishimeta ashiato wo nando mo mitsume kaesu 多少次反复凝视着全力走过的足迹 枯叶を抱き 秋めく窓辺に kareha wo daki、akimeku m

entry.tran: （常指因激动、生气或痛苦）叫喊，大喊，吼叫
entry.def: If you yell, you shout loudly, usually because you are excited, angry, or in pain.

example.ex: I'm sorry I yelled at you last night...
example.tran: 很抱歉昨天晚上我冲着你大吼大叫的。

entry.def: A yell is a loud shout given by someone who is afraid or in pain.

example.ex: Something brushed past Bob's face and he let out a yell.
example.tran: 有什么东西从鲍勃的脸上扫过，他大叫了一声。

means.word_mean: 1. a loud utterance; often in protest or opposition;

sentences.sentence: "the speaker was interrupted by loud cries from the rear of the audience"

means.word_mean: 2. a loud utterance of emotion (especially when inarticulate);

sentences.sentence: "she cried with pain when the doctor inserted the needle"
"I yelled to her from the window but she couldn't hear me"

means.word_mean: 2. utter or declare in a very loud voice;

sentences.sentence: "You don't have to yell--I can hear you just fine"

auth_sentence.content: Ortega didn't even bother to yell at him.

auth_sentence.content: You are not more credible when you yell.

means.word_mean: 叫喊, 号叫, 叫着说；大喊；吼叫

sentences.en: This gave them a chance to yell.
sentences.cn: 这给了他们大声喊叫的机会。

sentences.en: The crowd yelled when the hometown team scored a touchdown.
sentences.cn: 当他们自己的队得了底线分时, 人群高声呼喊起来。

sentences.en: They yelled their goodbyes when the bus left.
sentences.cn: 汽车开动时, 他们大喊再见。

jushi.english: This gave them a chance to yell.
jushi.chinese: 这给了他们大声喊叫的机会。

jushi.english: The lost man yelled, hoping someone in the woods would hear him.
jushi.chinese: 迷路的人大声喊着,希望林子里会有人听见。
